prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, Synth Lead, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, Synth Lead - this song has it all, except for Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, and Synth Lead, but Bass is absent.

Style 3:
No Bass, but this song still features Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, and Synth Lead.
